metadata.dcterms:title: Replication Data for: Weak magnetic field changes over the Pacific due to high conductance in lowermost mantle
metadata.dcterms:creator: Dumberry, Mathieu
More, Colin
metadata.dcterms:description: Fortran codes used in the numerical experiments, as well as data and GMT scripts needed to reproduce all figures of the study.
